query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `packages` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `code` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `nameEn` varchar(255),
  `description` text,
  `descriptionEn` text,
  `type` enum('starter', 'growth', 'enterprise', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  `priceMin` decimal(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  `priceMax` decimal(10, 2),
  `currency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SAR',
  `features` text,
  `limitations` text,
  `includedFrameworks` int,
  `includedControls` int,
  `includedAssessments` int,
  `includedUsers` int,
  `supportLevel` enum('basic', 'standard', 'premium', 'dedicated') NOT NULL,
  `trainingHours` int,
  `consultingHours` int,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `displayOrder` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `code_idx` (`code`),
  INDEX `type_idx` (`type`)
)
command:

  `code` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,

  `priceMax` decimal(10, 2),
  `currency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SAR',
  `features` text,

  `includedFrameworks` int,
  `includedControls` int,
  `includedAssessments` int,
  `includedUsers` int,
  `supportLevel` enum('basic', 'standard', 'premium', 'dedicated') NOT NULL,
  `trainingHours` int,
  `consultingHours` int,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `displayOrder` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `code_idx` (`code`),
  INDEX `type_idx` (`type`)
)
